section.title: Bugs
section.para: Known bugs can be found in the fvwm bug tracking system (accessible from the fvwm home page).
Bug reports can be sent to the fvwm-workers mailing list at fvwm-workers@fvwm.org (see the FAQ) or reported through the bug tracking system.
The official fvwm homepage is http://fvwm.org/.
